About me

I am a Front End developer at HYD, a digital agency based in London. Here I build the front end to all sorts of web applications using Next.js and React, and I connect them to diverse backends stacks which vary from project to project.

My full-stack development master's program at UOC involved becoming proficient in AngularJS for the front end as well as different backend solutions, from CMS to PHP and Node.js based frameworks.

While working on my masters I started my career in conversion rate optimization (CRO) development. This role provided me with a unique opportunity to work closely with browser API's, learn to write clean, self-documented code, as well as the optimization of site speed, which I audited for some of our clients.

Accessibility has been a passion since I started coding. I enjoy staying updated on the latest conventions, researching and implementing them in my day to day work.

What I love the most about being a developer is the fact that there is always a new challenge around the corner, always something new to learn, and a big community of equially enthusiastic people to share your learning experience with.

On my free time I like to relax listening to music, playing bass guitar, and climbing in the bouldering gym.

Projects

Bucle.app, a UX tooling platform

Angular | Nest.js | MongoDB | Chart.js | TailwindCSS

A platform to help UX researchers: it allows to create surveis, tree tests and card sorts. In addition, generates links to share with participants, collects their answers and allows for the researcher to visualize the data on complex charts and tables.

View API code View Bucle.app api's code View FE code View Bucle.app app's code

Snippets app, stores your code snippets

React | RTK-Redux | Styled Components | MongoDB | Express | JWT | Ethereal

The front end is built with React, using RTK from redux toolkit, it allows users to create, update, delete and view colour highlighted code snippets in several languajes. API built with plain express, uses JWT for authentication, MongoDB for data storage adn Ethereal for user email confirmation.

View codeView Snippets app's code

Espacios de vida

React | Gatsby | Netlify

I built this site for Natalia Ferrus, an atypical real estate agent who helps people find their dream homes in Spain. This static site is built on Gatsby

Visit espais de vida'ssite

Exchange.ly

Angular | Redux | API

This app allows users to filter and compare the latests currency rates as well as visualizing historic rates data fetched form exchangeratesapi.io through complex charts built using chart.js

View code for Exchange.ly

Fest-a-casa

HTML | SASS | Bootstrap

One of the things I have missed the most during lockdown is live music. I have built this streaming music festival site as a way to up my bootstrap skills, as well as to help me bring back that first line at a local band's gig feeling.

View code for fest-a-casa's site

Laravel Articles API

PHP | Laravel | API

A REST public API built on Laravel, using Laravel's Factoties to populate and SQL database, it allows to create, read, update and delete data on it.

View code for laravel articles API project

Experience

HYD agency

Front End Developer May 2021 - Present

Creating responsive, wcag compliant and cross-browser compatible web applications using React and Next.js. Building scalable services to consume data form REST and GraphQL APIs by implementing effective state management solutions. Integrating third party products for payments, google services etc.

Writing and maintaining documentation, code reviewing. Liaising with clients and project managers to provide support and technical perspective on viability and time estimates

Dentsu Intenational

CRO Front End Developer Assistant April 2020 - May 2021

Conducting A/B and multivariate test for a range of UK and International clients, using platforms such as VWO, Monetate or Goolgle optimize. Building tests based on XD prototypes from our design team and test plans from our strategy team. Adding custom GA and Hotjar tracking events to collect test data for our insights team.
